title: Jandex failing during CombinedIndexBuildStep

labels.name: triage/needs-reproducer
labels.description: We are waiting for a reproducer.

body:
### Describe the bug

When attempting to upgrade to 2.13.4.Final I'm seeing a failure during the Gradle quarkus build task
```
* What went wrong:
Execution failed for task ':test-app:quarkusBuild'.
> io.quarkus.builder.BuildException: Build failure: Build failed due to errors
        [error]: Build step io.quarkus.deployment.steps.CombinedIndexBuildStep#build threw an exception: java.lang.IllegalStateException: Failed to index: java.util.Collection
```

When I attach a debugger I can see that `org.jboss.jandex.Indexer#index` appears to be working as expected but when it returns, it ends up return null causing the failure. This only occurs for certain classes as I see others being indexed as expected

<details open>
<summary>Full stack trace below</summary>

### Expected behavior

Quarkus build works

### Actual behavior

Exception running the index build steps

### How to Reproduce?

_No response_
